response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and significance to both of us. Given its worth of $800,000 to you, I am extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $750,000. This offer is tailored to ensure that we can both benefit from this exceptional transaction. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this exciting opportunity.", "product_price": 750000}
